information: LES LAVANDES DU MOULIN : a family-run grower specialising in lavender. We are fresh lavender growers. We offer our lavender production in various forms: - essential oils - flower waters - dried flowers - bouquets. Dried flowers are packaged in sachets, flower water in spray bottles, and essential oils in glass bottles. Orders are sent out as soon as payment is received.
